docs.snippet: The once promising presidential bid of French conservative Francois Fillon, already seriously hobbled by pending corruption charges, was coming unraveled Friday with the resignation of his campaign director and his campaign spokesman, adding momen...
docs.lead_paragraph: The once promising presidential bid of French conservative Francois Fillon, already seriously hobbled by pending corruption charges, was coming unraveled Friday with the resignation of his campaign director and his campaign spokesman, adding momentum to a stream of defections and panicking his party.

headline.main: French Candidate Going It Alone Amid Campaign Defections
headline.print_headline: French Candidate Going It Alone Amid Campaign Defections
